content.rendered:
Introduction:

In this blog, the reader will receive an excerpt from Gulshan’s ongoing project in Greater Noida West. The Art Deco-themed project embodies aesthetic design, and contemporary creations, and oozes style to bring luxury to the area like never before.

Gulshan Group’s ongoing project in Noida is named Gulshan Avante and is located in Greater Noida West. This project is elegantly designed and backed with a clear vision offering a futuristic life in the location that is strategically situated very close to Delhi.

From the beginning itself, Gulshan Avante has been very well conceptualised. All aspects of the project, such as the name, layout, landscape, amenities and features are designed to make it stand out in Noida extension.

Here, you find a piece of Art standing tall with mesmerising architecture. Gulshan Avante pays homage to the Art Deco theme of French decorative arts, offering a contemporary façade for a modern lifestyle filled with luxury. It has a touch of modernism but also has a classic feel to it, these two things together bring to the surface, a perfect blend of luxury and art. It gives you the right vibe about the life.

It represents, ‘Avante’ comes from ‘Avant’ which means new and forward. Gulshan Avante is crafted with ideas for the future, Hence the life we are providing here is called a Forward Life.

There are only 92 units in Greater Noida West, a unique design with 2 units on each floor. With its elegant living style dipped in modernism and encapsulated in art, it carries all the characteristics of being an important hub for luxury lifestyles and convenience.

Gulshan Avante Greater Noida West – A Location to cherish

Gulshan Avante is surrounded by great educational institutes and healthcare facilities. It is just a stone’s throw away from Greater Noida and to Gaur City Mall, Galaxy Plaza, etc. It connects with NH-9, FNG, Yamuna Expressway Greater Noida Expressway.

In short, Avante is at the centre of all great things that are happening in Greater Noida West and is contributing to its philosophy of a Forward Life.

Avante is designed to ensure maximum comfort and intimacy. These 4 BHK apartments are tailored to perfection with excellent cross ventilation within the apartment. The floor-to-floor height is 3.50 meters which gives a feel of vastness and open space. The rooms are open and blended beautifully with intricately designed interiors. A family sit-out deck is directly connected to the living room hanging over lush green landscapes. Split AC systems are installed in the Living, Dining, and Family rooms as well as the Bedrooms.

With a double-height entrance lobby, it fills the sight of the viewers with simple awe. The lobby is designed in detail with elements of art and classy architecture. The project is a low-density one and has only 2 units per floor. It ensures maximum privacy as well as stylistic living. Avante is a green family project that ticks every box of eco-friendly and green living.

Conclusion:

With 92 exclusive four-bedroom homes located around the most convenient hub spots in Greater Noida West, Gulshan Avante is the ideal property to live in.
